entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
